data.title: The most complete offer of Sky Italy prepaid cards
data.meta_description: Sky Italy is a thematic Italian pay TV platform, available on Hotbird at 13 ° East. It includes more than 170 radio and TV channels.     With a selection of ...
data.text:
Sky Italy is a thematic Italian pay TV platform, available on Hotbird at 13 ° East. It includes more than 170 radio and TV channels.

With a selection of the greatest international TV channels combined with Premium movies and sports channels, Sky is offering one of the largest and most varied offer of thematic content in Europe.

Sky Italia is covering a wide range of sports events, and in specifically all the major Football championships.

On Sky TV bouquet, get a selection of the major thematic channels for the entire family!

Sky TV combines great entertainment and TV serie channels, including Fox, Fox life, Fox Crime Comedy Central... Sport channels like Eurosport and Eurosport 2, with the major European and international news channels, such as CNN, CNBC, Fox News, Fox Business...

With "Sky Calcio" premium bundle, you will get 7 of 10 games of the Italian Serie A

On Sports channels, you will get the main games of the spanish league "la Liga", the french ligue 1, Eurodivise and the Premier League *.

* Not available on prepaid cards.

The top international sporting events, covering 20 disciplines, are on "Sky Sport"

The Champions League, the Liga do Brazil, the Formula 1 , the italian basketball championship, the NBA and the Euroleague, the Tennis Masters Series, as well as all major tennis tournaments, Volley all these events are on Sky Sport

With top movies from the box office, Sky Cinema is the best offer for Cinema fans

12 channels totally dedicated to Cinema.

Sky Cinema is offering 10 different movies every evening and up to 260 movies per month. All in HD quality, with italian and original audio.
